product.title: PHPKD - vB Automated Bookie Center 'Ultimate'
product.description: This product is a 'bookmakers' or betting system that allows authorized users to post events & outcomes and then bet each others on it. Each outcome has it's own set of odds which can be modified through the life of an event, winning users awarded.

phrasetype.name: Permissions
phrasetype.phrase: Can Administer vB Automated Bookie Center
PHPKD - vB Automated Bookie Center Permissions
Can Moderate Bookie Events<dfn>This permission grants full control of bookie events and overrides all the above permissions when enabled (add/edit/bet/settle/delete/abandon).</dfn>
Can Private Bet On Bookie Events
Can Specify Which/How Much Users To Bet

phrasetype.name: Error Messages
phrasetype.phrase: You cannot add a bookie event to this thread because it already has one attached to it.
You have already betted on this bookie event. Please press back to return to it.
The bookie event you selected is not closed, it should be closed in order to be able to settle it. Please press back to return to it.
The bookie event you selected is not open, it should be open in order to be able to bet on it. Please press back to return to it.
Sorry, required initialization for "PHPKD - vB Automated Bookie Center" failed. Please make sure that the following file already uploaded and is readable "./includes/phpkd/vbabc/{1}".
Invalid bet! You either did not select an option to bet for, or entered an invalid value for your bet. Please press back to return to the bookie and try again.
Invalid settle! You have to choose either a winning option(s), or select the -no winners- option. Please press back to return to the bookie and try again.
Sorry, this bookie event reached it's maximum allowed betters. No more betting allowed. Please press back to return to it.
The value entered for timeout has exceeded the maximum possible value.
The value entered for timeout has exceeded the maximum possible value.
Please complete the title field, the group field and at least 2 option fields. Press the back button, correct the problem and try again.
Sorry, you don't have enough cash to bet on this bookie event. Please press back to return to it.
Sorry, only one specific user allowed to bet on this bookie event, it's not you! Please press back to return to it.
Sorry, this bookie event doesn't allow multiple bets. Only one bet allowed. Please press back to return to it.
Bookie event options cannot exceed {1} characters. Option(s) {2} exceed this limitation.
Sorry, you should confirm this action before processing it! Please press back to return to the bookie event & try again.
You can only add a bookie event to a thread within {1} minutes of posting the thread.
You can only edit a bookie event in a thread within {1} minutes of posting the thread.
"Bookie Bets Paid After" can't be before "Bookie Event Timeout", it should be after!

phrasetype.name: Forum-Related
phrasetype.phrase: PHPKD - vB Automated Bookie Center Options

phrasetype.name: Front-End Redirect Messages
phrasetype.phrase: Thank you for betting on this bookie event. You are now being taken back to the bookie event.
The bookie event has been successfully abandoned. You are now being taken back to the bookie event.
The bookie event has been successfully deleted. You are now being taken back to the bookie event.
The bookie event has been successfully $action. You are now being taken back to the bookie event.
The bookie event has been successfully settled. You are now being taken back to the bookie event.

phrasetype.name: Posting
phrasetype.phrase: This bookie event has been abandoned!
Add a Bookie Event to this Thread
Allow multiple choice: Give users the ability to select more than one option
How many users can participate in this bookie event & bet on it? You can limit challenged users or leave it unlimited. Leave this empty or put '0' for unlimited.
Are you sure you want to Abandon this bookie event?\n(Please note that this action can NOT be undone)
Are you sure you want to Delete this bookie event?\n(Please note that this action can NOT be undone)
Are you sure you want to Open/Close this bookie event?\n(Toggle Bookie Event Status)
Create a bookie event with this number of options
Remember to keep the bookie event options short and to the point
Bets on this bookie event can be settled after this date. If you don't settle this event by {1} days after this date, all bets are called off and stakes will be returned.
This bookie event has been settled!
This bookie event will be closed automatically after a period of time, enter a number of days here after which new bets can't be accepted.
This bookie event will close on {1} at {2}
This bookie event supposed to be closed on {1} at {2}
This bookie event supposed to be paid on {1} at {2}
This bookie event will pay on {1} at {2}

phrasetype.name: Style Tools
phrasetype.phrase: PHPKD - vB Automated Bookie Center Images Directory

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: Choose whether "PHPKD - vB Automated Bookie Center" is active or not (global switch).
If you've chosen to use 'Custom' cashing system from the above setting, then please enter here the absolute field's name in 'user' table that represents your preferred custom cashing system.

Select your preferred cashing system to use by default for this product's actions/activities. This product has it's own cashing system, but it can integrate with other cashing system as well.
You've multiple options to choose from:
  • Default
  • uCash
  • vCash
  • vBCredits
  • Reputation
  • Custom
The text that is presented when the "PHPKD - vB Automated Bookie Center" is closed.
Beginning and ending years in the format of: 2009-2015

You can specify certain users to be able to use this product's features, or to exclude others from being able to use it at all.
Select "Include All Users" to allow all users to be able to use this product's features, or select "Include Specific Users" to allow only those specific users -defined in the following setting-, or select "Exclude Specific Users" to allow all users except those specific users -defined in the following setting-.

If you've chosen "Include Specific Users" OR "Exclude Specific Users" from the above setting, then you've to enter those specified user IDs here in this setting's field. Separate user IDs by normal English comma.

Maximum number of options a user can set for the bookie event.
Set this option to 0 to allow any number of options.

Bookie event options will be limited to this number of characters.
Please choose a value larger than 0 and less than 251.
You can change the main script's name as you wish, this will have global effect, but you've also to change the actual physical file name on the server as well. (Default: phpkd_vbabc.php)

Bets on any bookie event should be settled after the specified date when created. If it is not settled by certain days after that date, all bets are called off and stakes will be returned. Specify this grace period in which users should settle bookie events after event timeout (in days).
Specify the time-limit (in minutes) within which the thread may have a bookie event added to it. '0' for unlimited!
Time Limit on Adding a Bookie Event to a Thread
Specify the time-limit (in minutes) within which the bookie event may be edited. '0' for unlimited!
Time Limit on Editing a Bookie Event in a Thread

Bookie event titles will be limited to this number of characters.
Please choose a value larger than 0 and less than 251.

If you set this option to 'Yes' the thread's last post time will be updated when: 1) a bet is placed, 2) bookie event settled, thereby returning it to the top of its parent forum listing.
Note that this option can cause confusion. The last post time of a thread will be changed with no visible post.
Update Thread Last Post on Bookie Event Bet/Settle

setting.optioncode: select:piped phpkd_vbabc|Default ucash|uCash vcash|vCash credits|vBCredits reputation|Reputation custom|Custom

setting.defaultvalue:
Sorry, the bookie center is unavailable at the moment while we are testing some functionality.

We will be back soon...
